website_summaries.verdict: If you want an alternative baby seat for the first year and don't mind the price tag, it's a sound choice.
pros: Provides all-around support for babies up to 11 months
Has soft polyester construction that comfortably supports baby
cons: It's expensive, and it's not practical once baby learns to sit

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have for all babies ages 3 months to 11 months
customer_reviews.text: The Hugaboo is simply amazing! We didn't think this product would work for our 3 month old grandson but it did work wonderfully! He was able to sit alone and surprisingly he pulled himself forward and sat up in Hugaboo. He loves it and it keeps him laughing and smiling and us too! The Hugaboo is sturdy, soft, comfortable and can be placed anywhere he needs a seat. I would definitely buy again for gifts to others and recommend to others! Thank you Hugaboo on proving a quality product that brings smiles to our entire family!
customer_reviews.author: Shonda

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is only 2 months old but he is so alert and always wanting to look around. He is a little wobbly of course because of his age so I need to put a little pillow in front of him while he is sitting in this so he doesn't lean forward or lean to the side. Once he gets just a little bit bigger this will be perfect for him to sit up on the couch like a little man with his mom and dad. It feels super comfortable. It is very well made and the pattern is really cute. All in all I think this is worth the price and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LauriedQ

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this as it's soft and yet supportive
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida, my daughter in Massachusetts. We talk every day about my 7 month old granddaughter. She was telling me how she sits her up against her boppy pillow and try to get things done only to hear LAILA crying and discover she slid down and was not sitting up. I went on Amazon looking for a solution. Voila, I saw this, ordered it and had it sent to her home. The call I got two days later was filled with amazement and gratitude. Seems laila loves it, sits straight, can reach over for her toys and plays on her own. I would recommend this as it's soft and yet supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a baby who likes to sit up.
customer_reviews.text: My little one is 3 months on the 10th of Jan but she has an insanely strong neck. We've been using this often. She loves to watch everything and this let's her do that. It's so soft and the buttons on the bottom are great. It allows you to take her out more easily. Its bulky but I'd rather it be bulky than uncomfortable. She's still kind of small for it at 13 pounds so we put a little neck pillow around her waist. This is not like the bumbo seat. Her legs aren't being forced into a position she can move them as much as she wants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was not useful for learning to sit upright, at all.
customer_reviews.text: didnt find this useful, at all. more difficult to get my child into and out of than its worth. The design urged a more straight leg when seated, rather than an outwardly bent leg, which is less effective for learning balance when sested. the large rounded back seemed to encourage baby to lean forward rather than try to sit upright. Couple that with the small front and all he tended to do, mist often, was lean forward and grab at his feet instead of attempting to learn to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: adam larrabee

customer_reviews.title: She is still a little small for it so she does kind of fall to the side while in it but now that she is sitting up a lot better she tolerates the chair for longer than she did ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 months old now and kind of has a love/hate relationship with this chair. She is still a little small for it so she does kind of fall to the side while in it but now that she is sitting up a lot better she tolerates the chair for longer than she did when we first got it a few weeks ago. She usually will sit in it for about ten minutes before she starts squirming and wanting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and great product
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my grandson until he was able to sit up more on his own. We still use it on the couch for story time. He is 7 months now. Had no problem getting his legs in and out. I left the first snaps open most of the time. The large padding in the back prevents him from falling backwards and hitting his head. it's very well designed. Also, covering comes off and can be washed. Washed once and no smell from the fabric afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: A Freese

customer_reviews.title: Mostly happy, one complaint
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm happy with the Hugaboo and would buy it for a friend. It allows baby to sit naturally with support (read: doesn't force the hips or knees into a position as the Bumbo does). However getting the baby out of the Hugaboo is awkward and quite difficult actually.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for an infant 4 months or above who is able to hold head up and my baby loves it but it isn't adjustable and my baby has a tummy which squishes when I put him in it. Putting him in is a struggle too, you have to have two ppl putting him in; in to hold baby's legs and the other to hold baby's upper body. I wish the whole item could be adjusted to suit size and for convenience of putting baby inland out. Also we use wholesome and 100% organic everything for our baby so i wish the material was made of 100% organic bamboo or cotton etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shevalued

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed for actively curious 5m old!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Exactly what we’ve been needing for our very active and curious grandbaby! She loves to look everywhere and grab everything and she gets frustrated with not being able to do all this on her own. We put her in this seat and I thought for sure there would be some slumping or sliding because she’s a little peanut at a 20% for weight, but it held her perfectly and she was absolutely delighted!! Her face lit up and you could see she was VERY happy to be sitting independent of assistance or restraints like chest straps! Thank you, this is genius.
customer_reviews.author: kiddiefondue

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new grandson who was about 7 weeks old and already growing fast. The infant sitting chair was soft and seemed comfortable, the only problem was it was already too small for my 7 week old grandson. I would never give this as s gift, it’s too expensive and would not survive the test of time, in this case, a month. I returned for a full refund and paid return label. Great seller to work with.
customer_reviews.author: molsby

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I received a newborn lounger as a gift and my baby loves it. As she's growing, she became more uncomfortable in the newborn lounger so I was in the market for an infant lounger. Came across this and thought I'd give it a try. Omg my baby loves it! She thinks she's a big girl now since she can support her head so she's always trying to sit up. With the help of this lounger, she's super happy. The quality is great. The fabric is soft. I would recommend this for infants!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not support trunk well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wanting to love it. My daughter is 3 1/2 mos old now. It says for 3 mos old and up, but I beg to differ. There is a wide opening on both sides so it does not support her sides, so she falls to the side. I don't think this is good for her posture if she is leaning to the side. After 5 to 10 min in it she is crying. I thought it would support her body better 360 like it said. May have to wait till she is a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ModernManUSA

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy until your baby can sit up
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this but was very disappointed when my baby just flopped forward and seemed extremely uncomfortable. I think this works best for babies who can already sit up on there own completely after 6 months. Also not easy to put them in and take them out. Great concept but didn’t work well for us. I have seen others that have an animal head on top which I think would help with the slouching.
customer_reviews.author: Lazara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Would def recommend to any new mom or as a baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is way better than those Bumpo or Bumbee seats (or what ever they're called). My 3 month old loves this seat. It's perfect support for his back and front. I love that it's soft and pillow like so that if his head falls he won't get hurt at all! The bottom and outside is removable so you can wash it too. This is a great feature because he loves to utilize the toy rings that are attached as teethers and will drool all over it. haha! All in all I love it and I would recommend to any new mom! It would also make a GREAT baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Pushes baby forward too much
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our daughter, to help her learn to sit up. She absolutely HATES it, and I don't blame her. This thing pushes her forward WAY too much. She couldn't sit up straight if she wanted to. It went straight into the closet. Would not buy again. We bought the Fisher‐Price Sit‐Me‐Up Baby Floor Seat ‐ which works SO MUCH BETTER!!!! Buy that instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson as he loves to sit up. At the time of purchase he was 3 months old and is now 4 months. At 3 months he was able to sit in it with assistance and now at 4 months he can sit on his own in it. Loves to sit and reach for his toys, or toes, depending on the day haha. I have only used it on the floor and I sit right next to him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, really wanted this to work but, soft and comfy but hard to get in and out of. my baby is 4 months and chunky, she has thick legs. A little pricey and then went cheaper after I bought. worth buying if u get for a good price and ur baby isn't a chunk.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Soft seat for support and play
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. Seemed a little pricey at first, but our son uses it every day, so it was worth it. We got this once he outgrew his Boppy lounger. It’s great for sitting and playing, giving some support while he learns to sit up on his own. I like that it lays flat on a surface (floor, or for us, the couch) instead of being raised like in a Bumbo or similar so he can easily reach surrounding toys. Messes wipe off fairly easy and the cover comes off to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Clare

customer_reviews.title: Not for small child
customer_reviews.text: Not for an infant. For much older 8+ months. Not for small child. My daughter is 3 1/2 months. She is a premie. She can hold her head and sit with help. She fell over sitting bc it’s such a wide opening. Very hard to get her in and out. She literally got stuck in it. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No back support.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use it. No back support or front support to prevent him from leaking forward and falling forward. PLEASE hold your child upright EVERY second in this. No blinking.
customer_reviews.author: Steph O.   🧐📲👍🏿🤩🤨

customer_reviews.title: Yay baby boy loves it
customer_reviews.text: My picky little boy actually likes this! My son doesn’t like swings, bouncers, walkers, or anything we’ve tried but he does like this seat!! He still needs support but he likes to sit straight up all the time unless he’s sleeping so I had a feeling he might actually like this when I bought it and I’m so glad he does.
customer_reviews.author: cortney

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy
customer_reviews.text: This was super comfy and durable but my son hated sitting in it. It was really hard to get his legs in and out and it was very top heavy so when he would lean forward, the whole thing toppled over. We ended up returning this and purchasing the Fisher Price sit me up chair instead, which he LOVES.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer chernecky

customer_reviews.title: awesome chair
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good chair! Our 3 month old LOVES it! He's very interested in sitting up but obviously can't by himself yet so this is supportive enough to keep him up. The toy attachments are great for entertaining him
customer_reviews.author: Jada

customer_reviews.title: Great support to help them sit up in the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter when she was about 3 months old to support her in a sitting position. At first she would only tolerate a few minutes at a time being so little, and as she grew she really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Son likes it when he wants to sit and play with his toys, we like it cause it keeps him safe
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed in the quality of fabric used
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the quality of fabric used. The first time I tried to unsnap the button at the leg hole the fabric tore at the snap. The fabric is pretty soft which is nice for the baby however it is also fairly thin and obviously delicate. There should be reinforcement around the snap but there is none. I have not tried using it yet and am unsure how to contact the seller
customer_reviews.author: Kamona

customer_reviews.title: No support. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this infant chair. It provided no support for my 3 month old. The back of the chair pushed her forward making it impossible for her to sit upright. It also did not fit securely around her so she would lean to one side. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Huff

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessary
customer_reviews.text: Meh! My baby doesn't seem comfortable at all in this little chair. The back pushes forward to much and the seat doesn't allow for easy insert of his legs on a flat surface. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Coz Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my son because of a flat spot on his head we were trying not to make any worse. He is quite the chunky boy and still had lots of room to wiggle around and fall off to one side in this thing, we had to stuff it with blankets so he had enough support. It's also a pain in the butt to get him in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Frustrated

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered today for my 2.5 month old, he is really starting to want to lift his neck and move around alot so I thought this chair was perfect. I put him in it as soon as it arrived. He loves it. I had to roll a small receiving blanket around him for extra support because he was leaning to the side but otherwise I love it. Very sturdy and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Davis

customer_reviews.title: Our little one just didn’t care for it much.
customer_reviews.text: It’s very soft and our little one does sit in it. She is a bit small for it so she tends to lean to one side or the other and it makes it a bit awkward for her. She gets upset after a few minutes . It is not as easy to get her in it either. We put it away for awhile due to she just didn’t seem to care for it for very long.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna C.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it just wasn't a good fit for my daughter but I might have used this twice where she actually enjoyed it and otherwise it was rather cumbersome and uncomfortable for her
customer_reviews.author: Elissa

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought for granddaughter when she comes over and we love it so much. It’s easy to clean and so comfortable for our 4 month old granddaughter. We plan to buy another one for her to have at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Tienda

customer_reviews.title: Flips
customer_reviews.text: It worked out fine for a little while and then one day my baby leaned forward and it flipped her on her face. She was 6 months old, which is within the age perimeters advertised on the product. This definitely wouldn’t work for older babies either, as it says it would. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: L H P

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES her Hugaboo!
customer_reviews.text: My almost five month old has been wanting to sit up by herself for a little while but isn’t as steady as she could be. We’d been propping up the boppy lounger and snuggling her in with our arm, but I wanted something where she could sit on her own without any assistance, and I wasn’t sold on the harder chairs they make. We put her in this today after receiving it and she absolutely LOVES it. She wouldn’t stop smiling! I’m so glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Good comfort
customer_reviews.text: The back on the hugaboo was almost too rounded, baby would fall to the sides or forward with how it propped her. Otherwise it was a great seat, super soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Tips over so you have to sit next to a ...
customer_reviews.text: Tips over so you have to sit next to a baby who is just learning to sit up. Defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and used for a week or so but he isn’t even a chubby baby and the leg holes are already too small. Not a good buy. Cute idea and cute chair but waste of money if you are looking for something for a longer time.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Novak

customer_reviews.title: I prefer the Bumbo floor seat
customer_reviews.text: I like this but it wasn't very easy to slip baby in and out of. Baby seemed pretty frustrated after sitting in it for a few minutes so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Decent product. Not for smaller babies.
customer_reviews.text: This is mostly as advertised. But the material isn't as soft as I was expecting it to be. It's nice and solid for support. But I have a 3.5 mo old with full neck support who is still unable to use this because he's a little on the smaller side (12lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great granddaughter. She has been sitting in it since she was three months old. At first we stuffed little blankets around her to keep her sitting straight. Now at almost 6 months she just sits in the unit And loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail H.

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves to sit in this
customer_reviews.text: It say 3+month but if you baby can hold its head up pretty good than they will sit perfectly in this
customer_reviews.author: deja chaney

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time, plus. Loved it, our 3 month old is now at that stage where he is trying to pull himself up to a sitting position and this perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mar Chen

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 3 month old. It's sooooo soft and it has a detachable seat
customer_reviews.author: Sc0rpi0n Queen

customer_reviews.title: Great way to prop baby
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for our son. We started using it around 4 months old and he loves it. We did have to tuck a blanket around him at first since he wasn’t totally stable on his Own. But otherwise we have loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great and way too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what it does. My daughter was uncomfortable in it and she threw herself over to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Komal

customer_reviews.title: Great seat for babies learning to sit up
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter, who is now 20 months, has simply loved this seat and it really did help her to learn to sit up independently while still allowing for a natural seated position.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Koerner

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this and can't wait for her little one to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Mares4ta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but my baby couldn’t fit too well and she was only 10 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my new lil' granddaughter who is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new lil' granddaughter who is 2 months old. Not much you can do with a 2 month old, but she enjoys sitting upright in this cute comfy Hugaboo! It allows her to view the world from a different perspective. Very soft and the colors match her nursery!
customer_reviews.author: PBS

customer_reviews.title: Great seat. Soft and supportive
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Soft and supportive. Nice to have a clip to attach a toy. Very helpful for helping with an extra hand while Mom is folding laundry by her side!
customer_reviews.author: ntemple

customer_reviews.title: My baby keep falling to the front all the time
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good product,my baby fell all the time to the front
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Centeno

customer_reviews.title: Great for interactive infant
customer_reviews.text: Love it for helping my 4 month old sit up & interact. Only issue I have is that it isn't easy to wash. The bottom does not disconnect for me to easily throw in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Learning to sit
customer_reviews.text: Great product, use for my son in helping him learn to sit, it isn’t huge and is very soft. Was definitely a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Meaghan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! My baby can sit on the floor with me upright and it’s much easier for me to play with her that way especially when my toddler is around!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rind

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product. Kid is not kept upright like the product is supposed to
customer_reviews.author: karo s.

customer_reviews.title: Cute soft and definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Son at about 5 months old price made me question it, but highly satisfied in buying! Cover comes off easy to wash, very very soft, son loves to sit in it while playing with his toys making him feel like hes big and sitting up! He still currently tips over so him being in this makes him not fall over ! And he is almost 9 months old. 18lbs 28 inches and still fits in it perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Iannotti

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made , baby sits up very well in this seat. Supports baby excellently
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sitting assistant
customer_reviews.text: This is great for helping baby sit on their own. Our baby enjoys it so much. She has also fallen asleep in it so it is pretty comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Sewmamamoss

customer_reviews.title: so bad. stiff
customer_reviews.text: so bad. stiff, the leg holes are so hard to get in and out of even for a 3 month old! the base popping open has no purpose. I sent it back and got a refund
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Safe,soft but at the same time very supportive.Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat of my baby!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product for my baby girl! Not only does she look super cute and comfortable in it, it really helps with her sitting up! The color mix on the seat are also very nice! Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M.

customer_reviews.title: Really waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The back is too stiff that it kept forcing my sons to sit basically bent over forward at all times. Therefore only used a couple of times to attempt to break in. Really waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!  Not child friendly at all
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult getting child in and out, looks adorable and seems to be of quality, but useless
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Good concept if baby accepts
customer_reviews.text: Good concept but my baby din’t like it. He feels himself trapped and try to escape.
customer_reviews.author: Radhika

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of similar products on Amazon and at lower price but am super happy about my choice. Really good quality. My 4 months old is getting tired of lying in her bed and this baby sofa gives her great support to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: Gang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: This has been one of the best purchases for our little man. He is sitting up better and enjoys being in it so much. He is able to play with his toys in his pack and a play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Won't support 3.5 months old baby.It is hard to get him out.Returning.
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It would have been perfect if they made the front a little bit bigger. There’s too much space in front that a three or four months old baby falls or leans forward too much.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne G.

customer_reviews.title: I personally think this product is great and is a great idea
customer_reviews.text: I personally think this product is great and is a great idea. Sadly though, my little one does not agree! My child prefers the comfort of my arms rather than something cute and soft that will help her sit! Hopefully other parents will find better use of this!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it. She’s sits up comfortably in it.
customer_reviews.author: Wyclef

customer_reviews.title: i love this especially during meal time
customer_reviews.text: i love this especially during meal time, but i hate getting her in and out of it. her legs always get caught but i see this is a reoccurring issue with this item. nonetheless great item
customer_reviews.author: Franceska and Frantz Wackmann

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, it’s hard to get my lo out of. It is comfy and worked well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s still a very nice for a baby
customer_reviews.text: As always, never leave children unattended. Maybe a little bit more higher in the front, babies tend to lean too far forward
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want to buy one in every color I love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: It’s just so cute and works super well. Sits sturdy on floor and on bed or couch. My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: TWest

customer_reviews.title: My son hates this thing. First it’s tough to ...
customer_reviews.text: My son hates this thing. First it’s tough to get in and out of and the second I got him in it he screamed until I took him out. It is soft and well made however
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Baird

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy. Read other reviews. Had to force 3 month olds legs in and out of holes. Buh-bye!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not a supportive "hug"
customer_reviews.text: Very soft but not snug enough to support my infant. The opening is rectangular and he just falls to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany A.

customer_reviews.title: Even though this was used for just a short time ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though this was used for just a short time, it was valuable for my Grandaughter to help her sit up and interact with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sawicki

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: He likes it for a short period of time lol he is 14 weeks, about 25 inches and 16 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: cute and soft - supportive, but can be tipped - baby loves it - he is 15 pounds and i dont see this lasting until 11 months
customer_reviews.text: cute and soft - supportive, but can be tipped - baby loves it - he is 15 pounds and i dont see this lasting until 11 months
customer_reviews.author: HD

customer_reviews.title: Great for children who struggle to sit up on their own!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad this exists! Because of developmental delays, my one year old son cannot sit on his own. I needed something that could help him. The Hugaboo has been such a game changer! The only thing that’s a little difficult is getting him out. Nothing that really bothers him or me. it’s SO worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: alexis sciarrillo

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fussy baby who wants to sit up but can't yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and take my money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool. My son seems to love it and it helps him sit up. It’s kind of weighted in the back so when my son leans forward he will not fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kara squires

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Did like it. Struggled to take my daughter out of it. Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby couch
customer_reviews.text: We just LOVE THIS BABY COUCH Sad he is already out growing it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Securely sits the child upright and supports them from falling over while giving parents a hands free moment.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this seat for my almost 4 month old grandson who is trying to sit up and although we found that he was falling to the side a little, he seemed to really enjoy sitting in the seat. Well made and decent support for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it and learning to sit
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but it shouldn't be so expensive. I use it on the couch, so baby can sit next to us
customer_reviews.author: Silviya

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about. It does what it said it would.
customer_reviews.author: tcurfman

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! I’ve used bumbos in the past but I love this way more! It’s more comfortable and provides a better seating position! Highly recommend! I have a 5 month old baby btw and 3 older kids and I wish I would have gotten one sooner!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: This seat has saved our lives! My son can move around and reach without feeling too limited. It’s really cushioned and fits his very very chunky baby legs which the fisher price chair we ordered just did not work ever for us because of that. AMAZING PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Infant didn’t like it and very difficult to get in and out of.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: .it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: It’s awkward trying to get the Baby in and out of the seat. But
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Howe

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I think it's cute. My daughter doesn't like sitting in it though and it tips over easily. I probably wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Zoey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, so does my son. Actually, he sat up by himself after 1 weeks of using it. Now we had to to feed him til we get his highchair. It's just a pain in the ass to remove the cover to each it and put it back on.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Practical !
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Now I don’t have to worry about her tripping over, being a mom of 3 with hands full, I can sure vote for this thing. I did put a small rolled blanket in the front to help her better sit up.
customer_reviews.author: HB MG

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft
customer_reviews.text: Nice little seat. Helps my baby keep her balance well
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect well worth Hugaboo!!
customer_reviews.text: My fav gift i bought for my baby! Very worth the price! Fabric removes easily and is thick enough so spills cant reach the seat itself. Snaps on the bottom so toys stay clean & not sitting on the floor. Buying another for friend's baby shower!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Settle

product_meta.title: The Original Hugaboo Infant Sitting Chair - Pink Chevron
product_meta.description: Color:Hot Pink/Grey/WhiteMom invented, The Hugaboo gives your baby The freedom to comfortably observe their surroundings, and spend quality time with the family.
feature_bullets: Upright seating position helps stabilize your infant's back, sides and legs while they learn to sit up

360 degrees of comfy support safely Wraps your baby in plush comfort as they observe their surroundings. Two toy attachment hoops perfect for floor time activities that develop sensory and motor skills
Attached seat bottom prevents your infant from sliding onto the floor. Machine wash cold water, delicate cycle
Lightweight and portable easily provides your baby a safe place to sit in any room of the house. Gives your baby the support she needs as she learns to sit up on her own
Do not allow infant to sleep in product, infant must be able to support their own head before using, do not leave infant in seat for extended periods of time

specifications.Care instructions: Machine wash cold. Dry low heat. Spot treatment if needed.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars617 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
